[neon.plugin.solver]
ovos-solver-bm25-freebase-plugin = ovos_bm25_solver.demo:BM25FreebaseQASolver
ovos-solver-bm25-squad-plugin = ovos_bm25_solver.demo:BM25SquadQASolver

[opm.embeddings]
ovos-json-embeddings-plugin = ovos_bm25_solver.embed:JsonEmbeddingsDB

[opm.embeddings.text]
ovos-bm25-embeddings-plugin = ovos_bm25_solver.embed:BM25TextEmbeddingsStore

[opm.solver.multiple_choice]
ovos-choice-solver-bm25 = ovos_bm25_solver.base:BM25MultipleChoiceSolver

[opm.solver.reading_comprehension]
ovos-evidence-solver-bm25 = ovos_bm25_solver.base:BM25SolverPlugin
